full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
## Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: 23-58256
* Publication Date: February 29, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 14, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation URL: None

## Notice Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GDS)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Tender Status: Expired

## Tender Description
The National Research Council Canada’s Security and Disruptive Technologies Research Centre has a requirement for the supply of one (1) 3.34 GHz-Bandwidth Oscilloscope. The delivery will be requested in Ottawa, Ontario.

## Pre-Qualification Requirements
This procurement is restricted to suppliers who have been pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC, Stream 2, Electronic Products, for Electrical Hardware and Supplies. Interested suppliers must download the solicitation document E60HN-16ELEC and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA).

## Evaluation Criteria
The procurement will be awarded to the responsive bidder holding a Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC - Stream 2, Electronic Products from Public Works and Government Services Canada who meets the mandatory technical requirements with the lowest aggregate price.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact Katie Homuth at:

* 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R6, Canada
* Phone: (343) 549-4539
* Email: [Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

The tender documents and additional information can be found at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33218/935450_npp-apm_e60hn-16elec-oscilloscope.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33218/935450_npp-apm_e60hn-16elec-oscilloscope.pdf).  Additional information regarding the procurement can be obtained by contacting the procurement officer directly. 


Make sure you have reformatted all essential information into a clean, easy-to-read, and easy-to-understand format
